outputs.output_descr:
Enhanced national and sub-national capacities to plan, monitor, evaluate, and implement the MDGs and related national development policies and priorities through
1. The national advisory committee capacity is enhanced to coordinate and  monitor HDR production as well as research team capacity.
2. The first draft of NHDR is developed

project_descr:
Outputs to:
A) National Human Development Reports produced
B)  NHDRs messages promoted 
C) Promote HD issues and measurements
project_title: Preparation of National Human Development Report
